named-query.name: BC_READ_SANDBOX_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT sandbox FROM org.broadleafcommerce.openadmin.server.domain.SandBox sandbox WHERE sandbox.name = :name

named-query.name: BC_READ_SANDBOX_ITEM_BY_TEMPORARY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT sandboxItem FROM org.broadleafcommerce.openadmin.server.domain.SandBoxItem sandboxItem WHERE sandboxItem.temporaryId = :temporaryId
